author: senh
title: Zozi Raises $30 Million in Financing
text: BING NEWS: Zozi Raises $30 Million in Financing As it seeks to become the bridge between the travel industry and the Internet, the start-up Zozi has drawn yet more backers. The company announced on Wednesday that it had raised $30 million in a new round of financing. The new infusion of capital was led ... 07/1/2015 - 7:33 am | View Link ZOZI Raises $30M Series C From Sir Richard Branson and Pritzker Vlock Ventures to Lead $100 Billion Global Tours, Activities and Events Market SAN FRANCISCO, CA, Jul 01, 2015 (Marketwired via COMTEX) -- ZOZI®, the fastest growing SaaS reservation system for businesses and marketplace for consumers for the tours, activities and events market, announces $30 million in Series C financing. 07/1/2015 - 7:07 am | View Link Online lifestyle marketplace ZOZI gets $10M to help add more Gurus, local experiences and getaways ZOZI, the online marketplace that looks to help people life an active lifestyle, has raised $10 million in growth capital.
